actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to increase the interest rates for loans made or insured under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for water and waste disposal, and essential community facilities.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to replace the current five percent interest ceiling on loans for water and waste disposal and community facilities with an adjustable ceiling based on current market yields for outstanding municipal obligations, plus not more than one percent.

titles.title: A bill to increase the interest rates for loans made or insured under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for water and waste disposal, and essential community facilities.
